title: (x) "Home of Undergound Rock" in CBGB logo - Commercial Script {Stephen}
content:
So...I found a recreation font online for the CBGB logo but does anyone know what font "Home of Undergound Rock" is supposed to be. Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141018205511im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cbgb1_4434.jpg)
author: SecretFun
